SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.ui.usermanual

Class UserManualTest

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.ui.usermanual.UserManualTest
@ExtendWith(org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationExtension.class) public class UserManualTest extends Object
Unit test class for the UserManual scene. This class contains tests for user manual functionality including: - Scene creation and initialization - UI component validation - Layout and styling verification - Markdown to HTML conversion - Navigation functionality
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110

  • Method Details

    • setupHeadless

      @BeforeAll public static void setupHeadless()
      Sets up the test environment before running tests. Note: Headless mode is disabled to avoid Monocle dependency.

    • start

      @Start public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Initializes the test scene and stage. Creates and displays the user manual scene with specified dimensions.
      Parameters:
      stage - The primary stage for the application

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Sets up the test environment before each test. Configures the stage dimensions and waits for UI updates.
      Parameters:
      robot - The FxRobot instance for UI interaction

    • testSceneCreation

      @Test public void testSceneCreation(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Tests the creation of the user manual scene. Verifies that: - Scene is created successfully - Scene dimensions are set correctly
      Parameters:
      robot - The FxRobot instance for UI interaction

    • testContentPolygon

      @Test public void testContentPolygon(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Tests the content polygon in the user manual scene. Verifies that: - Polygon exists - Fill color is white - Stroke color is #93D2F3 - Stroke width is 2
      Parameters:
      robot - The FxRobot instance for UI interaction

    • testContentPaneAndVBox

      @Test public void testContentPaneAndVBox(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Tests the content pane and VBox layout. Verifies that: - Content pane exists - VBox exists with correct spacing and padding
      Parameters:
      robot - The FxRobot instance for UI interaction

    • testTitleLabel

      @Test public void testTitleLabel(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Tests the title label in the user manual scene. Verifies that: - Title label exists - Text content is correct - Font properties are set correctly - Text color is dark blue
      Parameters:
      robot - The FxRobot instance for UI interaction

    • testWebView

      @Test public void testWebView(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Tests the WebView component in the user manual scene. Verifies that: - WebView exists - Border color and width are set correctly
      Parameters:
      robot - The FxRobot instance for UI interaction

    • testProceedButton

      @Test public void testProceedButton(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Tests the proceed button in the user manual scene. Verifies that: - Button exists - Text content is correct - Width is set correctly - Style properties are set correctly
      Parameters:
      robot - The FxRobot instance for UI interaction

    • testProceedButtonAction

      @Test public void testProceedButtonAction(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Tests the proceed button action. Verifies that: - Button click navigates to login scene - Stage title is updated correctly
      Parameters:
      robot - The FxRobot instance for UI interaction

    • testRelayout

      @Test public void testRelayout(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Tests the relayout functionality when window size changes. Verifies that: - Content polygon adjusts correctly - Content pane dimensions update correctly - Margins are calculated correctly
      Parameters:
      robot - The FxRobot instance for UI interaction

    • testMarkdownToHtmlConversion

      @Test public void testMarkdownToHtmlConversion()
      Tests the Markdown to HTML conversion functionality. Verifies that: - Headings with IDs are converted correctly - Lists are converted correctly - Bold text is converted correctly - Links are converted correctly
